head.title: Libraries Offer More Than What's on Internet

meta.content: Technology; New York and Region; Opinion
meta.name: online_sections

hedline.hl1: Libraries Offer More Than What's on Internet

abstract.p: Werner Renberg letter holds August 6 article on resources at Westchester County (NY) library's online system understates what is available (S)

block.p: The article ''Online Library Gives Patrons Greater Access'' on Aug. 6 may have properly cited the catalogs and other resources available to Westchester County residents on the Westchester Library System's online system, but it understates what is available to us because the W.L.S. system is not synonymous with all the free public online resources available.

The article ''Online Library Gives Patrons Greater Access'' on Aug. 6 may have properly cited the catalogs and other resources available to Westchester County residents on the Westchester Library System's online system, but it understates what is available to us because the W.L.S. system is not synonymous with all the free public online resources available.
It omits references to the White Plains Public Library (a fine, convenient place for research). Because its online catalog is separate, duplicate searches are required.
Also, there is no mention of the libraries of public and private colleges and universities in Westchester, which have United States government documents that public libraries often do not have.
